name: pc-monitor
description: Multi-language PC performance monitoring desktop application

scripts.build:all: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:rust && npm run build:python && npm run build:typescript && npm run build:csharp && npm run build:cpp
scripts.build:rust: cd backend-rust && cargo build && cargo tauri build
scripts.build:cpp: cd backend-cpp && mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake .. && cmake --build .
scripts.install:all: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:python && npm run install:typescript
scripts.install:python: cd backend-python && npm install && uv sync
scripts.clean: rm -rf frontend/dist backend-rust/target backend-python/dist backend-typescript/dist backend-csharp/bin backend-csharp/obj backend-cpp/build
scripts.test:all: npm run test:python && npm run test:typescript && npm run test:csharp
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:python
scripts.lint:python: cd backend-python && uv run ruff check .

author: PC Monitor Team
